bandplot
========

bandplot: Plot the band structure from vaspkit result.

* To execute ``bandplot -h`` for the parameters to use.
* Example::

    pbandplot -i band.dat -o band.png -l g m k g -d PDOS*
    pbandplot -b -l g m k g -y -5 2
